role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs juju on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Juju](https://juju.is/) is a Charmed Operator Framework, composed of a Charmed Operator Lifecycle Manager, and the Charmed Operator SDK. It allows you to deploy, integrate, and manage Kubernetes, container, and VM-native applications seamlessly across hybrid clouds. Juju drives Day 0 through Day 2 operations in your complex environment.
